{{Lang|'''Andou'''|ja=安藤|ja_rm=Andou}} is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]].

<gallery>

NPC Location Andou Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Andou is a Doushin guard who patrols the outskirts of Inazuma City. He conducts security checks on newcomers to the city.

===Appearance===
Andou wears a standard uniform modeled from the {{Lang|''ashigaru''|ja=足軽}} of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''shitagi'', gray ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''waraji'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with gray accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''han-kote'' (half-armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

:'''Andou:''' Hold it there! Please cooperate with the security check.

:::'''Andou:''' What... what is this?
:::'''Andou:''' Is it your companion? Then this P&mdash;Paimon being also needs an ID.
:{{DIcon}} I'm leaving~!
